title: What are your experiences with online tutoring on Vedantu? - Quora

response.answer_text: Disclaimer: I am working full time with Vedantu for last 10 months, but have been associated with Vedantu as a teacher for almost two years now. I will only limit my answer to my experiences as a teacher. My experience teaching on Vedantu has been, in one word, “Awesome”. I started teaching while I was working at Flipkart, had very limited time. But teaching was a bit of passion for me and really wanted to do it. Vedantu turned out to be a wonderful platform providing me complete flexibility and control over my schedule. Given the limited time I had, I was primarily teaching only one kid about 1–2 hours every week. The kind of bond we developed, even in an online setup, was simply amazing. This kid was very naughty and his dad tells me that he simply doesn’t study with any other teacher. What is beautiful about the personalized learning at Vedantu is that I was able to understand the kid and teach him in his own way. So all our sessions would as a rule start with a game for the first five minutes. First it was tic-tac-toe, and in just 4–5 sessions, all our games where a draw as he picked up the game. We even managed to play a lame version of football on Vedantu’s awesome whiteboard (both of us love football). He also made me compete with him in solving Rubic’s cube online with the video on. I did beat him everytime, but he got better and better. When the first 5 minutes of every session used to be so much fun for him, it was very easy for me to make him concentrate on what I taught for the next 55 minutes. Also, he somehow started to look up to me or maybe had a special bond, so I could control is naughty behaviour in between the session. I could even scold him (mildly) and he would listen to me :) All this was only possible because of Vedantu. I would never have been teaching if it weren’t possible from the comfort of my home. The kid would probably have never interacted with me outside of Vedantu. And given the one on one attention, I was really able to connect with the kid and make a difference in his learning. I got a great kick out of it, immensely satisfying. Some of the other advantages which I realized teaching on Vedantu: Flexibility to study/teach when you want and where you wantConvenience to study/teach from the comfort of homeFor students, accessibility to best teachers across the countryAbility to use amazing teaching tools - pics, gifs, videos, etc.Automated session notes printed at the end of every sessionRecordings of every session available for review laterVedantu ensures that teachers keep becoming better at teaching by constant review, guidance and peer benchmarkingAnd now as I am part of Vedantu, my conviction towards the idea has increased many times over. We are trying to change the world of eduation, one small step at a time.
